participant_1.background:
My home is wherever I'm sharing my wit.
I give my dog a big hug and some breakfast before I leave for work.
I live in the suburbs because it is a quiet place where I can relax and enjoy my family and friends.
I've broken many things because of my clumsiness.
I love to watch the deer on my vacation to Lake Michigan.

participant_2.background:
My passion is writing but my spelling is terrible, I'm still learning.
i am an amazing dancer.
I am not big on social media because I am not comfortable sharing my personal life with the world.
i am currently looking for a job in baltimore.
i am allergic to shellfish and cats.

content.text: Hi! What do you like to do in your free time?
I love to dance and write, but I'm still learning to spell!
That's great! I love to write too. Do you have a favorite genre?
I like to write poetry and short stories, but I'm not really good at it.
Hey, no one is perfect! I think it's great that you're trying something new.
Thanks! I'm getting better at it the more I practice.
That's great to hear! Do you have any goals for your writing?
I'd love to get published one day, but I'm not sure if that's realistic.
It's definitely possible! You just have to keep writing and practicing.
Thanks for the encouragement! I appreciate it.
No problem! What else do you like to do in your free time?
I love to spend time with my family and friends. We go on a lot of adventures together.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love spending time with my family too.
